#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

typedef long long ll;
typedef vector < long long > vll;
typedef unsigned long long ull;
typedef pair < long long,  long long > pll;
typedef pair < int,  int > pii;
typedef vector < int > vii;

#define mp make_pair
#define fst first
#define snd second

const int N = 1e5 + 500;
const ll mod = 1e9 + 7;
const ll INF = 1LL << 57LL;

int main()
{
    ios::sync_with_stdio(0);
    cin.tie(0);
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        int n;
        cin>>n;
        if(n%2==1)
        {
            n--;
        }
        n=n/2;
        if(n%2==0)
        {
            cout<<(n/2)*(n/2)<<endl;
        }
        else
        {
            cout<<(n/2)*(n/2+1)<<endl;
        }
    }
    return 0;
}
